ygData.subject: PLEASE Help, I keep getting booted after
ygData.msgSnippet: I keep getting booted after playing for about 5-10 minutes. I have upgraded everything, ran all patches, disabled sound. But nothing works. This has been going
ygData.messageBody:
I keep getting booted after playing for about
5-10 minutes. I have upgraded everything, ran all
patches, disabled sound. But nothing works. This has been
going for 3 days now, ever since the new Velious
patches. I also added AOL 6.0, but I DO NOT ACCESS the net
through AOL, I use Bellsouth to get online. I did not
have these problems before AOL 6.0 or the new patches.
I have deleted AOL 6.0 from myu comp. Any
suggestions? <br>BTW, I have a compaq 7470, vodoo3 video, amd
allegro ess sound.<br>Thanks all
